prompts: Create a cute, furry Pokemon that loves to dig in the dirt and play around.
I want a playful Pokemon that can roll around and disrupt its surroundings.
Generate a small Pokemon with a zigzag pattern on its fur and a cheerful expression.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a raccoon with a love for exploration and adventure.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into its forest habitat and is known for its speed.
Design a Pokemon that has a brown coat and is known for its agility and playful nature.
Show me a Pokemon that has a unique body shape and a knack for finding hidden treasures.
